scripts.build: npm run barrelize -ws && npm run build --workspace=@nodius/utils && npm run build --workspace=@nodius/process && npm run build --workspace=@nodius/client && npm run build --workspace=@nodius/server
scripts.server:dev: npm run dev port=8426 host=192.168.1.72 https=true --workspace=@nodius/server
scripts.client:dev: npm run dev port=8426 host=192.168.1.72 https=true --workspace=@nodius/client
